author: cframpton
msg: More work on "release" target which consists of source-release and binary-release targets.  The result in the "out" directory are:

Added several "FixMe"s to the build files that need to be resolved before the release.  By tradition, all "FixMe" tags (case-insensitive) have to be removed before a release and all ToDo tags (case-insensitive) can be deferred.

msg: bloodhound theme: a few tweaks to use bootstrap.css, and fix the gap underneath the main options

author: hwright
msg: Ev2 shims: When doing a wc->repos copy, calculate the proper common wc path

(wc_to_repos_copy): Calculate and use the common wc abspath.
